gloss: a business firm that publishes magazines / a business firm that publishes newspapers / a firm in the publishing business / an antiquity that has survived from the distant past / be pertinent or relevant or applicable / extending through all human cultures / government of a political unit by its own people / happen, occur, take place / presently occurring (either causally or incidentally) / supreme military leader exercising civil power in a region especially one accountable to nobody when the central government is weak / the period of history between classical antiquity and the Italian Renaissance / the territorial jurisdiction of a caliph
the state of actually existing objectively
availability in printed form / be found or available / obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service
